title: Flaming Nipples aka Mamilos em Chamas (Gurcius Gewdner, 2008)
description:
Synopsis - A perverted Rabbit live his life delivering pizza and doing rought sex with all kinds of animals. His life changes when he falls in love with a femmale rabbit who has a drug problem and strange connections with the underworld. A love story about the importance of making love.


It's a porn movie made with rotten puppets, doing a strange mixture of Jan Svankmajer(of movies like Meat Love and Alice), Jodorowsky (with cardboards and sperm),  Petter Jackson (more agressive than Meet the Feebles), Bruce Labruce (of LA Zombie) and Jorg Buttgereit (of Nekromantik). But in none of this movies you will see what you will in here.

No animal was killed for the production, they was buyed in a butcher shop and toy shops.

Gurcius Gewdner it's one of the most productive artists and filmakers of Brazil, and also know by his works editing Ivan Cardoso and Petter Baiestorf's movies ( he's a actor on  ARROMBADA: i WILL PISS IN YOUR GRAVE. 

But it's on his movies that you can see his freak and bizarre obssessions at his maximum level. 

It was released in Brazil in a 4 DVD's edition, this is the DVD I of the collection.
